LanguageData.JRWAlbertosaurus.label: Albertosaurus
LanguageData.JRWAlbertosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #09382-1905 [ALBERTOSAURUS SARCOPHAGUS] CODENAME: SERRATOR >92
A medium sized theropod that often hunt in small packs. They overwhelm prey with a mix of both brawn and numbers.
